isBetween

Source: R/qualification-pk-ratio.R
isBetween.Rd

Assess if `x` is between `left` and `right` bounds. Shortcut for `x >= left & x <= right` if `strict=FALSE` (default). Shortcut for `x > left & x < right` if `strict=TRUE`.

Usage

isBetween(x, left, right, strict = FALSE)

Arguments

x

Numeric values to assess

left

Numeric value(s) used as lower bound

right

Numeric value(s) used as upper bound

strict

Logical value defining if `x` is strictly between `left` and `right`. Default value is `FALSE`.

Value

Logical values

Examples

isBetween(1:12, 7, 9)
#>  [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE

x <- rnorm(1e2)
x[isBetween(x, -1, 1)]
#>  [1] -0.003319931  0.805631756 -0.815764696  0.761698769 -0.135888261
#>  [6]  0.941633619 -0.484797767  0.410483544 -0.508459321  0.282134310
#> [11]  0.809086077 -0.760543911  0.669584667 -0.253027956 -0.398773760
#> [16] -0.289637047 -0.249006039  0.984429011  0.143712810 -0.608210356
#> [21]  0.311390684 -0.488516054  0.816773761  0.324041072  0.580214728
#> [26] -0.035978974 -0.821382521  0.884299971 -0.045504985  0.635282791
#> [31] -0.462730967 -0.457381870 -0.149941108 -0.251441456 -0.373929690
#> [36] -0.992973272 -0.034235882  0.920277754  0.218395400  0.084024317
#> [41]  0.168278298  0.957603058 -0.239822654  0.389712768  0.898644254
#> [46]  0.437166947  0.327609938  0.387142710  0.244508454 -0.466958834
#> [51] -0.050068693 -0.462560394 -0.983678412 -0.189404741 -0.810873596
#> [56] -0.156641593 -0.001502461 -0.083219257 -0.863390333  0.999571942
#> [61]  0.849828535  0.391738916 -0.613493669  0.029623922  0.580079026
#> [66]  0.060755663  0.615803383

isBetween(x, cos(x) + 1, cos(x) - 1)
#>   [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
